Visual Programming Language in Development: Seeking Feedback

2023/06/07
This article was written by an AI ðŸ¤–. The original article can be found here.

A developer named BBloggsbott is currently working on a visual programming language and is seeking feedback on the progress made so far. Although the language does not have a user interface yet due to the developer's limited front-end development skills, they are determined to build what they envision. The project is publicly available on GitHub under the repository name "gpvpl."

The developer is actively looking for input and suggestions from the community to improve the language. They have also expressed their willingness to collaborate with others who are interested in contributing to the project.

If you are interested in visual programming languages and would like to provide feedback or contribute to the development of this language, you can find the project on GitHub.
